title: StayEase - Online Hotel Room Booking Website
description: An online hotel room booking website for a specific hotel. Users could book and unbook rooms if needed and view detailed billing information.

title: NestQuest - Real Estate Property Portal
description: A comprehensive real estate website where users can buy, sell, or rent properties.Implemented robust client-side and server-side validation techniques.

title: Easy Ride - Car Rental Agency Website
description: An end-to-end web application for car rental services.Enabled customer registration, information organization, car browsing, and booking.
